privacyPolicy.title: Introduction
data: HiAll values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our group blind dating platform.

privacyPolicy.title: Information We Collect
data: We collect personal information you provide when creating an account, such as your name, email address, phone number, and profile details.

privacyPolicy.title: How We Use Your Information
data: We use your information to provide, personalize, and improve our services, facilitate group dating experiences, and communicate with you about updates and promotions.

privacyPolicy.title: Sharing Your Information
data: We may share your information with partnered restaurants for reservation purposes and third-party service providers to enhance the platform’s functionality.

privacyPolicy.title: Data Security
data: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information but cannot guarantee complete security due to potential internet vulnerabilities.

privacyPolicy.title: User Responsibilities
data: You are responsible for keeping your account information secure. Please notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

privacyPolicy.title: Third-Party Links
data: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those sites.

privacyPolicy.title: Cookies
data: We use cookies to improve user experience and analyze platform usage. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

privacyPolicy.title: Children’s Privacy
data: HiAll is not intended for users under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

privacyPolicy.title: Policy Updates
data: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Continued use of HiAll after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

privacyPolicy.title: Contact Information
data: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@hiall.io

termsAndConditions.title: Group Blind Dating Services

termsAndConditions.title: Partnered Restaurants

termsAndConditions.title: Prohibited Activities
